thread.title: Texas, OU Heisman winners Earl Campbell and Billy Sims will be on hand
thread.title_full: Texas, OU Heisman winners Earl Campbell and Billy Sims will be on hand | Dallas Morning News

author: Chuck Carlton
title: Texas, OU Heisman winners Earl Campbell and Billy Sims will be on hand
text:
Texas' Earl Campbell and Oklahoma's Billy Sims as well the Heisman Trophy will be part of the Nissan display at the State Fair on Saturday.
Fairgoers will have a chance to meet Campbell, the 1977 winner, and Sims, who won in 1978, as well as have their photos taken with trophy from 8-10 a.m.
On Twitter:
 @ChuckCarltonDMN
